text: Jo log apne maal Allah ki raah mein sarf (kharch) karte hain, unke kharch ki misaal aisi hai, jaise ek dana boya (sow) jaye aur uske saat (seven) baalein niklein aur har baal mein sau (hundred) daaney hon, isi tarah Allah jiske amal ko chahta hai afzoni (manifold/zyada) ata farmata hai , woh faraag dast (All-Embracing) bhi hai aur aleem bhi
